title: I keep getting a security alert ticket?
body:
Every time I log into league now, I get one of those verification security tickets.
This happening to anybody else?

replies.body: Would this be for the game or for the website? I thought you meant the game but I've only ever seen that on webpages (where they are usually harmless).
Only happens when the league client loads.

How very curious. I'm afraid I can't help you at all, but it's definitely something worth submitting a ticket about given it's abnormal. It's _probably_ harmless, could be some kind of authentication issue for some of the web content that loads on the splash page of the client, but I would definitely submit a ticket.

Can't say I am. What does it say? I haven't seen anything like that so I don't really know what it is. 

Regardless, if it's a security thing I'd recommend changing your password just in case, then submitting a ticket to support to ask what it's about.
